children.name: The Sun contains 99.86 percent of the Solar System's known mass, with Jupiter and Saturn making up making up most of the rest.
The energy created by the Sun\’s core is nuclear fusion
97% of water on Earth is salty and not usable. 2% is frozen. That leaves us with just 1% of usable water!
As Earth spins, gravity points toward the center of our planet, and a centrifugal force pushes outward
